title: Zac e no longer shows range on hover?
body: It no longer shows his range on e when you hover it. If this is something that is being implemented, I must not of seen it in update.

replies.body: My fault, sorry! We're restructuring a lot of data to make it easier for us to work on the game, and I accidentally broke his max range indicator. I submitted a fix for it, but too late to get into this patch.
yeah and it's really annoying wtf rito
